itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Clown's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Clown's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Fruit of Nature
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Powder of Flame
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Monk's Branch
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Monk's Branch requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Combat Steel Champron
item.desc: Horse helmet made of steel. Very durable but it is heavy.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Red Plumed Champron
item.desc: Horse helmet decorated with red feather. Study and light.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Black Stone (Weapon)
item.desc: Weapons can be enhanced through Black Spirits.\n\n- Able to Enhance: Weapon, Secondary Weapon
